name: Hero Knight
description:
COLLECT COIN AND DEFEAT SKELLY GANG

Introduction

Hi, this is my first game project. 2D Platformer really interesting to make. In this project, I tried to make 2D Platformer but with combat system. Now, it still on development. I need to learn more about game mechanics and logic. 

How To Play

Use your keyboard for controlling the main character:

W  for Jump,  A and D for moving to Left and Right. J for normal attack and Double J for high damage attack. W (jump) and Double J for high damage attack from top
